Detailed Description

The system that manages the simulation of KinematicCharacterMotor and PhysicsMover

◆ AutoSimulation

bool KinematicCharacterController.KinematicCharacterSystem.AutoSimulation = true
static

Determines if the system simulates automatically. If true, the simulation is done on FixedUpdate

Property Documentation

◆ InterpolationMethod

CharacterSystemInterpolationMethod KinematicCharacterController.KinematicCharacterSystem.InterpolationMethod
staticgetset

Sets the interpolation method of the system:

  • None: no interpolation
  • Unity: uses Unity's built-in rigidbody interpolation
  • Custom: uses a custom interpolation
